About Me

This page is about me

BIO

Hi, my name is Yogyas, but my friends call me Yogas, i'm 39 years old. I have 2 lovely kids. I'm from Surakarta, Central Java, Indonesia. I love Python since i work on opensipkd.com - a Software Company whose main products is Government Taxes Application. We build it with Pyramid (for new version) and CodeIgnitier(old version). The apps just not provide system information for Government, but it has interoperability to many system. For an example, we provide payment gate away, Host 2 Host with ISO 8583. I started work at October 2019 until now as Junior Programmer in Maintenance & Deployment Division. My job desc. are : 1. Maintenance and bug fixing the existing & running Apps. 2. Adding and Customizing new features based on customer requests. 3. Deploying apps on a server.
